original_title: The Jitterbugs: Pioneers of the Jit
overview: A one-of-a-kind documentary highlighting the founders of Detroit's leading dance legacy: the Jit. Combining historical footage and exclusive interviews, get a glimpse of the Jitterbugs' past, career, and how a key contemporary is carrying the torch, featuring a bonus instructional on Jit steps and style.
title: The Jitterbugs: Pioneers of the Jit
